Description: Back knee on floor, relax hips towards floor and keep body upright
Get into a squat position, twist one arm to ceiling and follow with eyes
Lie on back with knees tucked up, slowly drop from one side to the other
Stand with feet apart, touch toes with opposite fingers keeping other arm outstretched
Circle arms forwards, then backwards
Stand with feet apart, reach to left right right arm, then swap
Kick heels to bum
Sprint on the spot
Squat twice on the spot, then do a backwards lunge with either leg
Get into a hand plank position, and kick knees up alternately; twist across body slightly for an extra stretch
Jump sideways twice, then jump on spot twice, alternate directions
Get into a hand plank position, lift legs up alternately backwards
Lie on back with feet up, hold one leg up, lift hips up then lower to ground; swap halfway
Lie with legs straddled, sit-up and touch toes, alternating between legs
Jump swap between a straddle and crossed feet, punch fist forwards on alternate jumps
Squat with straight back, jump forwards twice, then shuffle back to start point
Hold arms to side and kick feet out alternately quickly
Start in backwards lunge, swing back leg forwards and hop on supporting foot; use arms for balance
Sit with one leg straight out in front, and the other crossed over; pull knee in to chest
Back knee on floor, relax hips towards floor and keep body upright
Lie on back, pull knee to chest alternately and hold
Stand, pull ankle to bum alternately and hold
Kneel with one leg straight behind, tuck opposite foot on opposite side in front of body
